Package org.sindice.rdfcommons

This package declares the main RDF model classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RDFParser Parser for RDF streams.
ResultSet Defines the result for a SPARQL select query.
ResultSetXMLSerializer This class is responsible for serializing RDF objects in XML.
SparqlEndPoint Endpoint to access to the SPARQL interface.
TripleFilter Filter for triples of a triple set.
TripleIterator Defines the iterator over a TripleSet.
TripleSet Defines a triple container.
 

Class Summary
AllTriplesFilter Accepts all submitted triples.
DefaultXMLSerializer Default implementation of ResultSetXMLSerializer.
InMemoryResultSet In memory implementation of ResultSet.
InMemoryResultSet.VarEntry  
SparqlEndPoint.EndpointResponse  
Triple Models an RDF triple.
TripleBuffer Defines a buffer of triples.
TripleIteratorImpl Default implementation of TripleIterator.
 

Enum Summary
ResultSet.VariableType  
SparqlEndPoint.QueryType  
 

Exception Summary
RDFParserException Defines an exception thown by RDFParser.
SparqlEndpointException Defines an exception raised by a SparqlEndPoint implementation.
 

Package org.sindice.rdfcommons Description

This package declares the main RDF model classes.
